alert.note: Alert for Knox (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 9:16PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN FULTON AND WESTERN KNOX COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM CDT... At 916 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Windsor to near Avon. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Galesburg, Abingdon, Knoxville, Wataga, Avon, Oneida, Fairview, London Mills, Maquon, Rio, Gilson, East Galesburg, Henderson, St. Augustine, Ellisville, Galesburg Airport, and Delong. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 34 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
